open_context_url.doc_string: Opens the url under the mouse click in the default browser.

open_dir.doc_string: Opens the specified dir in the default file manager application, optionally highlighting the specified file.

args.name: dir
args.doc_string: The absolute path to the directory to be opened in the default file manager application.

args.name: file
args.doc_string: The name of the file that is to be highlighted when the file manager application is launched, relative to the path of the directory.

open_file.doc_string: Opens the specified file. Will dynamically open resource files from '.sublime-package' archives as read-only, if the specified override file does not exist.

args.name: file
args.doc_string: Absolute path to the file to be opened. Also accepts snippet like variables like '$packages' which will be expanded.

args.name: contents
args.doc_string: The contents to be put in the file, if the file doesn't exist.

args.name: group
args.doc_string: The group to open the file into. The group needs to exist for this argument to work.

args.name: add_to_selection
args.doc_string: Whether to add the opened file as a part of the current group's multiselected sheet(s).

args.name: encoded_position
args.doc_string: Whether to open the file at the given line & column. The line & column information must be specified in the 'file' argument.

open_in_browser.doc_string: Opens the specified html file in the default browser using the file:// protocol.

open_project_or_workspace.doc_string: Opens the specified project or workspace file, in a new window by default.

args.name: file
args.doc_string: The absolute path to the project or workspace file.

args.name: new_window
args.doc_string: Whether to open the specified project or workspace file in a new window.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index of recent folder to be opened as per the folder_history in the session file.

open_recent_project_or_workspace.doc_string: Opens a recently opened project or workspace.

args.name: index
args.doc_string: The index of the workspace as per recent_workspaces in the session file.

open_url.doc_string: Opens the web browser to display the URL or the default application associated with the file/folder represented by the URL.

args.name: url
args.doc_string: The URL to be opened.

open_containing_folder.doc_string: Opens the folder containing the given file in the default OS file manager.

args.name: files
args.doc_string: The list of absolute file paths. Only the first value is considered.

open_file_settings.doc_string: Opens the syntax specific setting file based on the syntax of the active view. This is deprecated and only kept for backwards compatibility.

overwrite.doc_string: Overwrites the selection(s) at the caret(s) location(s) with the given characters.

args.name: characters
args.doc_string: The characters that will overwrite the selection(s).

open_folder.doc_string: Opens the specified folder(s) in the OS file manager.

args.name: dirs
args.doc_string: The list of absolute path(s) to the directorie(s) to be opened.

open_symbol_definition.doc_string: Opens the symbol defined in a file. Used internally by the auto_complete_goto_definition command.

args.name: path
args.doc_string: The absolute path to the file where the symbol is defined.

args.name: new_tab
args.doc_string: Whether to open the file (containing the symbol) in a new tab. The default value is 'False'.

args.name: hide_popup
args.doc_string: Whether to hide the popup after navigating to the symbol. The default value is 'False'.

args.name: keep_auto_complete_open
args.doc_string: Whether to preserve the state of the AC window when the view loses focus. The default value is 'False'.

args.name: add_jump_point
args.doc_string: Whether to add the symbol navigation to the jump history list. The default value is -1, indicating that the navigation is not added.
